code: import Bangkok from'./assets/CelestiaBangkok.webp';import Ginger from'./assets/CelestiaGinger.webp';import Mammoth from'./assets/CelestiaMammoth.webp';import Shwap from'./assets/CelestiaShwap.webp';const CelestiaBlogs=[{title:"Celestia in Bangkok",image:Bangkok,alt:"Celestia Bangkok Banner",link:"https://blog.celestia.org/bangkok/"},{title:"Introducing the Ginger upgrade: faster finality, higher throughput",image:Ginger,alt:"Celestia Ginger Upgrade Banner",link:"https://blog.celestia.org/ginger/"},{title:"Initial results from Mammoth Mini: 27MB/s of permissionless data throughput",image:Mammoth,alt:"Celestia Mammoth Mini Banner",link:"https://blog.celestia.org/mammoth/"},{title:"The Shwap Upgrade: 12x faster DA sampling",image:Shwap,alt:"Celestia Shwap Banner",link:"https://blog.celestia.org/shwap/"}];export default CelestiaBlogs;

sourcesContent:
import Bangkok from './assets/CelestiaBangkok.webp'
import Ginger from './assets/CelestiaGinger.webp'
import Mammoth from './assets/CelestiaMammoth.webp'
import Shwap from './assets/CelestiaShwap.webp'

const CelestiaBlogs = [
    {
        title: "Celestia in Bangkok",
        image: Bangkok,
        alt: "Celestia Bangkok Banner",
        link: "https://blog.celestia.org/bangkok/"
    },

    {
        title: "Introducing the Ginger upgrade: faster finality, higher throughput",
        image: Ginger,
        alt: "Celestia Ginger Upgrade Banner",
        link: "https://blog.celestia.org/ginger/"
    },

    {
        title: "Initial results from Mammoth Mini: 27MB/s of permissionless data throughput",
        image: Mammoth,
        alt: "Celestia Mammoth Mini Banner",
        link: "https://blog.celestia.org/mammoth/"
    },

    {
        title: "The Shwap Upgrade: 12x faster DA sampling",
        image: Shwap,
        alt: "Celestia Shwap Banner",
        link: "https://blog.celestia.org/shwap/"
    }
]

export default CelestiaBlogs
